org.apache.flink.client

类 CliFrontend

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.client.CliFrontend

  • public class CliFrontend
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of a simple command line frontend for executing programs.

        protected PackagedProgram buildProgram(ProgramOptions options)
                                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                       ProgramInvocationException
        Creates a Packaged program from the given command line options.
        返回:
        A PackagedProgram (upon success)
        抛出:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        ProgramInvocationException

      • retrieveClient

        protected ClusterClient retrieveClient(CommandLineOptions options)
        Updates the associated configuration with the given command line options.
        参数:
        options - Command line options

      • getJobManagerGateway

        protected ActorGateway getJobManagerGateway(CommandLineOptions options)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Retrieves the ActorGateway for the JobManager. The ClusterClient is retrieved from the provided CommandLineOptions.
        参数:
        options - CommandLineOptions specifying the JobManager URL
        返回:
        Gateway to the JobManager
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createClient

        protected ClusterClient createClient(CommandLineOptions options,
                                     PackagedProgram program)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a ClusterClient object from the given command line options and other parameters.
        参数:
        options - Command line options
        program - The program for which to create the client.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • handleArgException

        private int handleArgException(java.lang.Exception e)
        Displays an exception message for incorrect command line arguments.
        参数:
        e - The exception to display.
        返回:
        The return code for the process.

      • handleParametrizationException

        private int handleParametrizationException(ProgramParametrizationException e)
        Displays an optional exception message for incorrect program parametrization.
        参数:
        e - The exception to display.
        返回:
        The return code for the process.

      • getActiveCustomCommandLine

        public CustomCommandLine getActiveCustomCommandLine(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine commandLine)
        Gets the custom command-line for the arguments.
        参数:
        commandLine - The input to the command-line.
        返回:
        custom command-line which is active (may only be one at a time)

      • getCustomCommandLineList

        public static java.util.List<CustomCommandLine<?>> getCustomCommandLineList()
        Retrieves the loaded custom command-lines.
        返回:
        An unmodifiyable list of loaded custom command-lines.

      • loadCustomCommandLine

        private static CustomCommandLine<?> loadCustomCommandLine(java.lang.String className,
                                                          java.lang.Object... params)
                                                   throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                          java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                                                          java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                                          java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                          java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        Loads a class from the classpath that implements the CustomCommandLine interface.
        参数:
        className - The fully-qualified class name to load.
        params - The constructor parameters
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        java.lang.InstantiationException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
